project.name: CVT Platform
project.caption: This is a web application that I created as graduation project in 2022
project.description: This is a web application that I created in 2022, which is a very significant platform as it helps job seekers to build their resumes and e-portfolios. And since it was my graduation project, I spent a lot of effort on it from analyzing the system to designing diagrams until building the final app. I am so delighted about it and about its final result.
